main event: A pilot observed two unidentified aerial objects moving rapidly and erratically over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 12 seconds., The objects were about 5 times the size of a C-47., The pilot described the objects as round and luminous., The objects were flying at an altitude between 30,000 ft. and 50,000 ft., The weather conditions were clear with 30 miles visibility.
sighted object: two round luminous objects in the sky
witness description: A reliable pilot with 39 years of experience, who was wearing Polaroid glasses at the time of sighting.
